level.heading: NON-FIRST AMENDMENT RELATED PARADE, MARCH, RACE, WALK-A-THON OR OTHER SIMILARCTIVITY[COLON] PERMIT REQUIREMENT (ยง 24-707)

level.text: A permit shall be issued under this section for a non-First Amendment related parade, march, race, walk-a-thon or other similar activity if, after consideration of the application and other information that may otherwise be obtained, it appears that the activity will otherwise meet the criteria for a First Amendment assembly as set forth in section 706.9.

A permit shall not be issued unless the applicant has provided for the services of the number of event monitors that the Chief of Police or his or her designee considers reasonably necessary to ensure that the event will be conducted in conformity with the event permit.
A permit shall not be issued unless the applicant complies with any special event user fee requirements pursuant to section 720.
